Horoscopes

III

Aries: to find out more about turtles, visit your local library

Taurus: you will come to realise Pythagoras was right all along. You should apologise.

Gemini: do not resist arrest

Cancer: Curiosity will get the better of you. You will eat an orange in the shower. You will enjoy it.

Leo: Trotsky is a good name for a horse

Virgo: I'm making a note here; huge success

Libra: wash your hands. Thoroughly this time.

Scorpio: print('{entity} is {attribute}'.format(entity = 'yo momma', attribute = 'fat'))

Spaghettarius: grow some teeth

Capricorn: the Star Wars movies will continue to disappointment you

Aquarius: du wirst Deutsch sprechen

Pisces: don't forget to feed your fish.
